job_tasks.phrase: explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of new techniques and methodologies for AI computations, aligning with the core definition of model development and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing
job_tasks.justification: This involves strategic planning and execution of technical AI initiatives, which falls under the broader scope of model development and its application.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with our cryptography team, getting up to speed with the technical nuances & implementing AI models accordingly
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on understanding and implementing AI models within a specific technical paradigm (confidential computing).

job_tasks.phrase: adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of modifying and implementing AI model architectures, a key aspect of model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
job_tasks.justification: This implies integrating feedback into the ongoing development and planning of AI initiatives, which touches upon software development and integration processes.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with our DevRel team and actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to the creation of tools and workflows is a software development task, even if it's for AI development.

soft_skills.phrase: in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with specific teams.

soft_skills.phrase: You will have regular touchpoints with AI developers on the Nillion network
soft_skills.justification: Indicates regular communication and interaction with other developers.

soft_skills.phrase: work closely with our DevRel team
soft_skills.justification: Highlights close collaboration with another team (Developer Relations).

soft_skills.phrase: getting up to speed with the technical nuances
soft_skills.justification: Implies a need to learn and adapt to new technical details.

soft_skills.phrase: design & execute a technical AI roadmap
soft_skills.justification: Designing and executing a roadmap requires understanding business goals and translating them into technical strategies.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on developing, adapting, and implementing generative AI models and techniques within a specific paradigm (confidential computing). While there are elements of creating AI tools and workflows (1.A.1), the core responsibilities (1.B.1) are centered around the AI models themselves, specifically generative AI. The role requires a deep understanding and manipulation of AI model architectures and their application in a novel computing environment, fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile due to the emphasis on generative AI model development and adaptation.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI model development and adaptation within a specific domain (confidential computing). The focus on generative AI is explicit. However, the mention of 'AI toolkit' and 'AI development workflows' could slightly lean towards software integration, but the primary emphasis remains on the AI models themselves. The profile assignment is strong, but not a perfect 5 due to the nuanced interplay between model adaptation and tool creation.
